sentences.sContent: As a gift, he brought a big fish and a quart of the largest oysters I had ever seen.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a gift, he brought a big fish and a quart of the largest oysters I had ever seen.
sentences.sCn: 他给我们带来了一条大鱼还有一夸脱海蛎子，我从来没见过那么大的海蛎子。

sentences.sContent: In the Civic Center Park, across from thePublic Library Building, he drank almost a quart of water and felt himselfrefreshed.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the Civic Center Park, across from thePublic Library Building, he drank almost a quart of water and felt himselfrefreshed.
sentences.sCn: 在公共图书馆对面的城市中心公园里，他喝了差不多一夸脱水，觉得自己又清醒了。

words.tran: 四分之一；地区；季度；一刻钟；两角五分；节；vi. 住宿；驻扎；vt. 将…四等分；供某人住宿；num. 四分之一

trans.tranCn: 夸脱（容量单位）；一夸脱的容器
trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.
